```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

matric.classification.create <- function(){
  setNames(data.frame(matrix(ncol = 4, nrow = 0)), c("Accuracy", "AccuracySD", "Kappa", "KappaSD"))
}

matric.classification.append <- function(df, model, row_name){
  df_tmp <- matric.classification.create()
  df_tmp <- bind_rows(df_tmp, c(Accuracy=mean(model$resample[["Accuracy"]]),
                                AccuracySD=sd(model$resample[["Accuracy"]]),
                                Kappa=mean(model$resample[["Kappa"]]),
                                KappaSD=sd(model$resample[["Kappa"]])))
  rownames(df_tmp) <- c(row_name)
  rbind(df, df_tmp)
}

df <- matric.classification.create()
df <- matric.classification.append(df, model_rpart, "rpart")
df <- matric.classification.append(df, model_multinom, "multi")
df <- matric.classification.append(df, model_lda, "lda")
df <- matric.classification.append(df, model_svmRad, "svmRad")

df

```
